languages.text:
"Полезный инструмент в руках маэстро —
Он хора дирижера плоти часть".

traits.locale_text:
"Полезный инструмент в руках маэстро —
Он хора дирижера плоти часть".
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
"A dream to play, the maestro does declare,
His flesh now sings in chorus with the rest."
languages.original_text:
"Полезный инструмент в руках маэстро —
Он хора дирижера плоти часть".

traits.locale_text:
"A dream to play, the maestro does declare,
His flesh now sings in chorus with the rest."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

traits.locale_text:
"A dream to play, the maestro does declare,
His flesh now sings in chorus with the rest."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

traits.locale_text:
"A dream to play, the maestro does declare,
His flesh now sings in chorus with the rest."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

traits.locale_text:
"A dream to play, the maestro does declare,
His flesh now sings in chorus with the rest."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
“大师已将梦境之音奏响，
他的肉体正与他人合唱。”
languages.original_text:
"A dream to play, the maestro does declare,
His flesh now sings in chorus with the rest."

traits.locale_text:
“大师已将梦境之音奏响，
他的肉体正与他人合唱。”
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
«Un sueño que representar, declara el maestro,
y su carne ahora canta a coro con el resto».
languages.original_text:
"A dream to play, the maestro does declare,
His flesh now sings in chorus with the rest."

traits.locale_text:
«Un sueño que representar, declara el maestro,
y su carne ahora canta a coro con el resto».
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
「音楽家が演奏を夢見る演劇
彼の肉体は今、他の者たちと合唱している」
languages.original_text:
"A dream to play, the maestro does declare,
His flesh now sings in chorus with the rest."

traits.locale_text:
「音楽家が演奏を夢見る演劇
彼の肉体は今、他の者たちと合唱している」
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
"Ein Traum zu spielen, der Maestro ruft.
Sein Fleisch nun singt im Chor mit den And'ren."
languages.original_text:
"A dream to play, the maestro does declare,
His flesh now sings in chorus with the rest."

traits.locale_text:
"Ein Traum zu spielen, der Maestro ruft.
Sein Fleisch nun singt im Chor mit den And'ren."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
« Un rêve à jouer, déclare le maestro avec ardeur,
Et avec le reste, sa chair chante en chœur. »
languages.original_text:
"A dream to play, the maestro does declare,
His flesh now sings in chorus with the rest."

traits.locale_text:
« Un rêve à jouer, déclare le maestro avec ardeur,
Et avec le reste, sa chair chante en chœur. »
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
"Notaya dökülecek bir düş dedi maestro, gür bir ifadeyle.
Şimdilerde şakıyor onun da bedeni, geri kalanlarla birlikte."
languages.original_text:
"A dream to play, the maestro does declare,
His flesh now sings in chorus with the rest."

traits.locale_text:
"Notaya dökülecek bir düş, dedi maestro gür bir ifadeyle,
Şimdilerde şakıyor onun da bedeni, geri kalanlarla birlikte."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito
